title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.6 - Hearings to be public; stenographic records of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.6 - Hearings to be public; stenographic records of hearing

State Regulations

Unless otherwise ordered by the commission in the public
interest, application and revocation hearings held by the commission shall be
open to the public. Stenographic records of hearings shall be made and
transcripts thereof may be furnished to any person after the conclusion of the
hearing upon payment to the commission of the reproduction costs thereof as
established by section
1.23
(f) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
6.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
